Issue.creator: c0rwin
Issue.summary: Delivery service client need to failover to another ordering service endpoints in case of failure.
Issue.description: Currently the peer code has no fallback logic of retries in case of the ordering service is not up and running. We need to take care of implementing some circuit breaker to make sure to eventually get connected to the ordering service once it becomes available. Moreover need to keep special care of making peer still be able to maintain the ability of peers to join the new channels and starting pulling out object from ordering right after peer will connect to it.
